name: ColourCauldron
description:
Mini game jam 2022 entry.

Creators: Shroudeye & Mergen & Daimon

Used assets: Medieval Dungeon by Infuse Studio

Collect the magic potions to open coloured doors! You have limited time to solve the maze, so keep an eye for extra time powerups!

To mix a potion, throw them into a cauldron!

Have fun!

Controls:

WASD to move

Left click to throw held potion (Use to open doors & trigger switches)

E to pick up objects, pick potions from cauldrons, and open doors.

C to crouch

Esc/P to pause
